descriptions.title: What is Razor?
descriptions.content: Welcome to the Razor, the free and open-source typing racing platform. Race against friends and improve your typing skills while having fun in private lobbies on Razor. So, grab your keyboard and get ready to Raze!

descriptions.title: Private Room
descriptions.content: A room is a private space where you and your friends can gather before starting a race. You can create your own room or join someone else's using a link. Players can wait in the room until others arrive, and anyone can start the race whenever they're ready.

descriptions.title: Open Source
descriptions.content: Razor is an open-source project, which means that anyone can contribute to the project. You can find the source code on GitHub({{link}}).
